Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a red/brown pottery vessel, interior very worn, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text identifying contents (joins 55688, 55731 and 55733).
Curator's comments: Part of 1922,1014.118 Part of 1922,1014.151 Peet & Woolley, City of Akhenaten I. Pl. LXIV fig. 1
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393172) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393172)
